Name: Bond Effect
Description: <color=#0F70BC>Veritas</color>: Upon entering Sniping Form, Machiavelli will launch lightning toward the target enemy, damaging it. Chain Lightning will be triggered each time Veritas' sniping attacks hit the same target.\nChain Lightning: Lightning will arc toward all enemy units once, dealing DMG.\n<color=#0F70BC>Garnet</color>: When there are 3 Electric Charges, casting Lightning Fall will also summon Machiavelli to cast Legion Combo, dealing high DMG while Paralyzing the enemy hit and reducing their Resistance for <color=#0F70BC>6s</color>.

Name: Bond Effect
Description: <color=#0F70BC>Laurel</color>: When Laurel is attacked while Crimson Abyss is not in battle, the latter will enter the battle to block the attack and activate Matrix. <color=#0F70BC>4s</color> cooldown.\n<color=#0F70BC>Lucia</color>: After Crimson Abyss casts an Active Skill, gain a set of 3-Ping Orbs of the same color.

Name: Bond Effect
Description: <color=#0F70BC>Lucia</color>: When Luna's Active Skill is still ongoing, casting any 3-Ping will extend the duration of spikes by <color=#0F70BC>2s</color>.

Name: Bond Effect
Description:
<color=#0F70BC>Feral</color>: Shark-speare turns [Dark] and no longer acts on its own, but will attack when Feral launches any pursuit or Scratch Reap, damaging the enemy while creating a black hole to pull in nearby enemies continuously.
Each time Shark-speare launches a co-attack, the entire team's DMG increases by <color=#0F70BC>5%</color>, stacking up to <color=#0F70BC>3 times</color>.
When casting Active Skills, the bonus is doubled and lasts <color=#0F70BC>5s</color>, and will be reset at the end of this duration.
Character gains a random set of 3-Ping Orbs after casting Signature.

Name: Bond Effect
Description: <color=#0F70BC>Veritas</color>: The lightning area left by Excavator will pull enemies in.\n<color=#0F70BC>Garnet</color>: After Excavator launches a leap strike, it will leave a banner and Garnet will immediately gain 3 Electric Charges.

Name: Bond Effect
Description: <color=#0F70BC>Veritas</color>: After Explorer casts an Active Skill, Veritas' lightning arrows in Sniping Form become scattered for 15s. For every 1 enemy present, gain 1 random orb and rearrange the Signal Orbs.\n<color=#0F70BC>Garnet</color>: Explorer's arrows now target Garnet and damage a larger area when hit.

Name: Bond Effect
Description: <color=#0F70BC>Feral</color>: Rearrange the Signal Orbs each time Dead-on Pounce is triggered. Duskglow Realm now moves with the character.

Name: Bond Effect
Description: <color=#0F70BC>Feral</color>: When Wolfspirit Form is activated, Sentry Gun will attack together, adding extra DMG to each hit of Growling Wolfspirit.
